meanings.definition: The world or realm of computers.
meanings.sent1: In computerdoms, technology continues to advance rapidly.
meanings.sent2: Many people work in computerdoms, creating software and hardware.
meanings.sent3: The inhabitants of computerdoms were shocked when the power went out during the big presentation.
meanings.sent4: Computerdoms is like a vast digital universe waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: Exploring computerdoms feels like diving into a sea of endless possibilities.

meanings.definition: The collective community or society of computer users.
meanings.sent1: Computerdoms rely on each other for support and knowledge.
meanings.sent2: In today's world, computerdoms play a crucial role in connecting people globally.
meanings.sent3: The annual computerdoms convention was a fun gathering of tech enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: Within computerdoms, friendships are formed over shared interests in technology.
meanings.sent5: Being part of computerdoms feels like being part of a big, tech-savvy family.
